DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY FOCUS : COUNTYWIDE ; AID CENTER COLLECTING FOR QUAKE VICTIMS
DOC.TEXT: A food and clothing collection center has opened in Santa Ana to assist the region ' s earthquake victims . Donations of clean , neatly packaged clothing , baby food , disposable diapers and non-perishable food items , such_as canned goods , will be accepted at the center , which is at O ' Neil Moving and Storage , 2061 S . Ritchey St . Food should be stacked in boxes . Individual garments cannot be accepted . The Orange County chapter of the American Red_Cross and the area ' s Catholic Charities are sponsoring the collection center , which will remain open " until the needs of the people affected are met , " organizers said . The center will be open weekdays 10 a.m. to 7 p.m. , and 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. on Saturdays . For more details , or information about making corporate donations , call the local Red_Cross at ( 714 ) 835-5381 . GEOFF BOUCHER
